pages.text: Wa Tara Al-Mala'ikata Haffina Min Hawli Al-`Arshi Yusabbihuna Bihamdi Rabbihim Wa Quđiya Baynahum Bil-Haqqi Wa Qila Al-Hamdu Lillahi Rabbi Al-`Alamina
Tanzilu Al-Kitabi Mina Allahi Al-`Azizi Al-`Alimi
Ghafiri Adh-Dhanbi Wa Qabili At-Tawbi Shadidi Al-`Iqabi Dhi At-Tawli La 'Ilaha 'Illa Huwa 'Ilayhi Al-Masiru
Ma Yujadilu Fi 'Ayati Allahi 'Illa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Fala Yaghrurka Taqallubuhum Fi Al-Biladi
Kadhabat Qablahum Qawmu Nuhin Wa Al-'Ahzabu Min Ba`dihim Wa Hammat Kullu 'Ummatin Birasulihim Liya'khudhuhu Wa Jadalu Bil-Batili Liyudhiđu Bihi Al-Haqqa Fa'akhadhtuhum Fakayfa Kana `Iqabi
Wa Kadhalika Haqqat Kalimatu Rabbika `Ala Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'Annahum 'Ashabu An-Nari

Al-Ladhina Yahmiluna Al-`Arsha Wa Man Hawlahu Yusabbihuna Bihamdi Rabbihim Wa Yu'uminuna Bihi Wa Yastaghfiruna Lilladhina 'Amanu Rabbana Wasi`ta Kulla Shay'in Rahmatan Wa `Ilmaan Faghfir Lilladhina Tabu Wa Attaba`u Sabilaka Wa Qihim `Adhaba Al-Jahimi
